alert.note: Alert for Lapeer; Oakland (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 5:39PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Lapeer and northeastern Oakland Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 538 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hadley, or 8 miles south of Lapeer, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Metamora around 550 PM EDT. Dryden around 605 PM EDT. Imlay City around 610 PM EDT. Almont around 615 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Leonard and Thornville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
